description: This file defines classes, enums, and functions related to handling team-based run response events and responses within a larger software system. It includes event types, data structures for responses, and methods for serialization/deserialization, specifically for team run events and responses.

classes.name: TeamRunEvent
classes.description: Enumeration of possible team run event types, such as start, response, completion, error, and various reasoning and memory update events.

classes.name: BaseTeamRunResponseEvent
classes.description: Base class for all team run response events, including common fields and a method for creating an instance from a dictionary.

classes.name: RunResponseStartedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the start of a team run response, including model information.

classes.name: RunResponseContentEvent
classes.description: Event representing a delta or content update in the team run response, including content, citations, and media attachments.

classes.name: RunResponseCompletedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the completion of a team run response, including final content, media, reasoning, and member responses.

classes.name: RunResponseErrorEvent
classes.description: Event indicating an error occurred during the team run.

classes.name: RunResponseCancelledEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the team run was cancelled, with an optional reason.

classes.name: MemoryUpdateStartedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the start of a memory update.

classes.name: MemoryUpdateCompletedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the completion of a memory update.

classes.name: ReasoningStartedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the start of reasoning process.

classes.name: ReasoningStepEvent
classes.description: Event representing a reasoning step, including reasoning content.

classes.name: ReasoningCompletedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating reasoning has been completed.

classes.name: ToolCallStartedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating a tool call has started, including the tool details.

classes.name: ToolCallCompletedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating a tool call has completed, including media produced.

classes.name: ParserModelResponseStartedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the parser model response has started.

classes.name: ParserModelResponseCompletedEvent
classes.description: Event indicating the parser model response has completed.

classes.name: TeamRunResponse
classes.description: Class representing the entire team run response, including content, media, events, member responses, and serialization methods.

methods.name: team_run_response_event_from_dict
methods.description: Factory function to create a specific team run event object from a dictionary, based on the event type.
